description: Lists all batch inference jobs in the account.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Enumerating historical jobs helps attackers understand typical GPU schedules so they can hide within or disrupt them.
Knowing which jobs exist and what logs they generate can guide attackers in deleting or tampering with related evidence.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListModelInvocationJobs to review sensitive prompts, spot valuable outputs, or plan when to insert malicious workloads.
